name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: ipc.[port_number].decay-scheduler.period-ms
description:
How frequently the decay factor should be applied to the
    operation counts of users. Higher values have less overhead, but respond
    less quickly to changes in client behavior.
    This property applies to DecayRpcScheduler.

name: dfs.client.write.byte-array-manager.count-reset-time-period-ms
description:
The time period in milliseconds that the allocation count for each array length is
    reset to zero if there is no increment.

name: mapreduce.job.encrypted-intermediate-data.buffer.kb
description:
Buffer size for intermediate encrypt data in kb
  default is 128

name: ha.failover-controller.graceful-fence.rpc-timeout.ms
description: Timeout that the FC waits for the old active to go to standby

name: dfs.datanode.max.nodes.to.report
description:
Number of nodes to include in JSON report. We will return nodes with
    the highest number of votes from peers.

name: dfs.client.mmap.retry.timeout.ms
description:
The minimum amount of time that we will wait before retrying a failed mmap
    operation.

name: dfs.namenode.reencrypt.batch.size
description: How many EDEKs should the re-encrypt thread process in one batch.

name: dfs.client.deadnode.detection.idle.sleep.ms
description: The sleep time of DeadNodeDetector per iteration.
